name: Tron (System Editoriale)
overview: Tron, a dueling worm\snake game for 1-2 simultaneous players was published in Commodore Club - software # 15 game compilation. Remember the fantastic Walt Disney movie, where the protagonist was projected into the fantastic dimension inside a computer? In this game you will be the hero of the terrible motor course that will see you engaged in exciting challenges both against the computer and against another player. There are six difficulty levels of play. Power! Take your joystick in hand and be ready to enter the Motodrome!
